definition: to nibble away at sth/to eat into/to erode

sentences.english: Iron corrodes unless it is greased or kept clean.
sentences.chinese: 如果不塗油或保持清潔鐵便會腐蝕。

sentences.english: It was butane vapor, leaking from a corroded steel pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 那是從腐蝕的鋼製石油管道中泄露的丁烷蒸汽。

sentences.english: Corrosion Preventing of Saturator Using Epoxy Glass-Fibre Cloth.
sentences.chinese: 飽和器環氧玻璃鋼防腐蝕實用新技術。

sentences.english: This reduces your confidence, making you more vulnerable to your fears.
sentences.chinese: 它會腐蝕掉你的自信，使你被恐懼打敗。

sentences.english: Glacial acetic acid is a dehydrating agent and an irritant and is corrosive.
sentences.chinese: 冰醋酸是個脫水代理及刺激物和腐蝕。

sentences.english: Heavier rainfall could also cause soil erosion and landslides.
sentences.chinese: 而強降雨也可能導致泥土的腐蝕和山體滑坡。

sentences.english: The beetle contains a caustic acid-like juice called cantharidin.
sentences.chinese: 該甲蟲體內含有一種腐蝕性的酸性液體，名爲斑蝥素。

sentences.english: Glass containers are non-permeable, but they are breakable and heavy.
sentences.chinese: 金屬容器易腐蝕，且讓儲存在裏面的水變得很難喝。

sentences.english: Wood or glass-fiber spacers are used to prevent the electrodes form touching.
sentences.chinese: 電極襯有木頭或玻璃纖維以防電極腐蝕。

sentences.english: The types and characteristics of the corrosion occurred on metallic components of aircraft were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了發生在飛機金屬構件上的腐蝕類型及其特點。

sentences.english: Petroleum industry is one of industrial systems which is puzzled by metal corrosion.
sentences.chinese: 石油工業是最受金屬腐蝕問題困惑的工業之一。

sentences.english: The initial stabilization for a leaking cylinder containing corrosives is isolation in a well-ventilated area.
sentences.chinese: 第一步是把裝有腐蝕劑的鋼瓶隔離在通風良好的區域。

sentences.english: Advantages of the process are higher yield, simple procedure, shorter reaction time, non-corrosive, non-pollution, etc.
sentences.chinese: 該工藝產率高，反應時間短，無腐蝕無污染。

sentences.english: Corrosion-free due to the use of high grade fluoropolymers.
sentences.chinese: 採用高質量的含氟化合物，防腐蝕。

sentences.english: It occurs because less oxygen is available in the clay than in the sand.
sentences.chinese: 產生腐蝕的原因是粘土內的氧含量較砂土內的少。

sentences.english: The obtained topcoat shows good weatherability and anti -corrosion property.
sentences.chinese: 該面漆具有優良的耐候性能和防腐蝕性能。

definition: to damage by scratching/to gash/to lacerate
deformation/to become deformed/to change shape/to morph
